sentences.en: An earthy , uncouth, servile peasant creature old Katy was.
sentences.cn: 老凯蒂真是个土里土气 、 恭顺的农民.

sentences.en: Briary: Describes young wines with an earthy or stemmy wild berry character.
sentences.cn: 似石南的: 形容年轻的葡萄酒带有的泥土味或带茎的野生浆果特征.

sentences.en: Does cure heat up catch a cold to earthy idea there is?
sentences.cn: 治疗热伤风有什么好的土办法?

sentences.en: Earthy: Describes wines with aromas or flavors of soil or earth.
sentences.cn: 土味的: 形容葡萄酒带有土壤或泥土的芳香和滋味.

sentences.en: For a minute he literally hated this earthy , cynical world to which one belonged, willy - nilly.
sentences.cn: 一时之间,他真恨起这个谁都不能不属于其中的 、 鄙俗而吹毛求疵的世界来.

sentences.en: His head was large and ugly; he had pale scanty hair and an earthy skin.
sentences.cn: 他的脑袋大而丑, 头发灰白稀疏,土色的皮肤.

sentences.en: I'm attracted to warm, earthy colours.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢那种泥土般色调的暖色。

sentences.en: Michael has an earthy sense of humour; he likes rude jokes.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔有一种粗俗的幽默感, 他喜欢讲粗俗的笑话.

sentences.en: She is a very physical young woman, earthy, and very intense.
sentences.cn: 她是个很粗犷的年轻女子，快人快语，非常热情。

sentences.en: The air is full of an earthy smell after the rain.
sentences.cn: 雨后的空气里弥漫着一种土腥味.

sentences.en: The rooms had the clean earthy smell of wet clay.
sentences.cn: 这些房间有湿黏土散发出来的清新泥土气息。

sentences.en: The stairs are decorated in golds and earthy browns.
sentences.cn: 楼梯油漆成金色和土褐色。

sentences.en: There was something vital and earthy and coarse about him that appealed to her.
sentences.cn: 他身上有一种生气勃勃的粗俗味儿吸引着她.

sentences.en: What treats the earthy way of the cold quickly?
sentences.cn: 有什么快速治疗感冒的土办法?

words.tran_cn: 地球；陆地；泥土；尘世；[电] 地线

trans.tran_cn: 泥土的，土质的，朴实的，粗俗的
trans.tran_en: tasting, smelling, or looking like earth or soil
